title: Blended Simulation Training for Strengthening Workplace Teacher Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in educational curriculum operations and foundational proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Hybrid Learning Environment Combining Smartphone-Based VR Simulations and Offline Workshops for Learners Serving as Corporate Training Coordinators or Internal Instructors

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in performing the role of a teacher in VR simulations reflecting real workplace scenarios.
Learners earn a score of 3 or higher on a rubric-based evaluation of instructional design competencies, incorporating peer feedback in a blended (online + offline) methodology environment.
Through project-based assessment, learners develop and present one actionable educational strategy to improve workplace learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
